alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 2:19PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Winona, Olmsted, northeastern Mower, south central Wabasha and northwestern Fillmore Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stewartville, or 8 miles south of Rochester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eyota around 230 PM CDT. Dover around 235 PM CDT. St. Charles around 240 PM CDT. Altura around 250 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Whitewater State Park. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 203 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
